bioconda.name: bioconductor-snphood
bioconda.summary: SNPhood: Investigate, quantify and visualise the epigenomic neighbourhood of SNPs using NGS data

biotools.summary: This R package investigates and visualizes the local neighborhood of a set of SNPs of interest for NGS data such as chromatin marks or TF binding sites from ChIP-Seq or RNA-Seq experiments. It comprises a set of easy-to-use functions to extract, normalize and summarize reads for a genomic region.
